mapper.select: select count(*) FROM MAIN_RMC as rmc, SPN_CODE as spn, FMI_CODE as fmi where rmc.FMI = fmi.code AND rmc.SPN = spn.code

select rmc.time, rmc.car_id, rmc.FMI, fmi.name_kr as FMI_NAME, rmc.SPN, spn.description_kr as SPN_DESCRIPTION, rmc.DTC, rmc.CM, rmc.DRIVE_SPEED, rmc.OC, rmc.RPM, rmc.GPS_LAT, rmc.GPS_LONG from MAIN_RMC as rmc, SPN_CODE as spn, FMI_CODE as fmi where rmc.SPN = spn.code AND rmc.FMI = fmi.code order by time desc limit #{listSize} offset #{offset}
